Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: McLaughlin, S.A., M.F. A'Hearn, K.P. Klaasen, and B. Carcich, DEEP IMPACT DOCUMENTATION SET V1.0, DI-C-HRII/HRIV/MRI/ITS-6-DOC-SET-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2008.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Documentation for raw and reduced data sets from the cruise and encounter phases of the Deep Impact mission; Documentation for the thermal-vacuum data sets is included
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set contains documentation for the Deep Impact Mission archive. It specifically includes documentation for the raw and reduced cruise and 9P/Tempel 1 encounter data sets (for science and navigation) as well as the laboratory thermal-vacuum data sets.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview
=================
This data set contains documentation for the Deep Impact Mission
archive. It specifically includes documentation for the raw and
reduced cruise and 9P/Tempel 1 encounter data sets (for science
and navigation) as well as the laboratory thermal-vacuum data sets.
The documents apply to mission data collected from 27 June 2002
through 13 July 2005, nine days after the encounter with comet
9P/Tempel 1.
This documentation set should be used when working with the
following Deep Impact data sets:
Thermal-Vacuum
--------------
TV1 : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-GROUND-TV1-V1.0
TV2 : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV-2-GROUND-TV2-V1.0
TV3 : DII-CAL-ITS-2-GROUND-TV3-V1.0
TV4 : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV/MRI-2-GROUND-TV4-V1.0
Flight - Science
----------------
HRII raw cruise : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0
HRII raw encounter : DIF-C-HRII-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
HRII reduced encounter : DIF-C-HRII-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0
DIF-C-HRII-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
HRIV raw cruise : DIF-CAL-HRIV-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0
HRIV raw encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
HRIV reduced encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0
DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI raw cruise : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0
MRI raw encounter : DIF-C-MRI-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI reduced encounter : DIF-C-MRI-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0
DIF-C-MRI-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
ITS raw cruise : DII-CAL-ITS-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0
ITS raw encounter : DII-C-ITS-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
ITS reduced encounter : DII-C-ITS-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0
DII-C-ITS-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
Instrument Temps : DIF-C-HRII/HRIV/MRI-6-TEMPS-V1.0
Tempel 1 Surface Temps : DIF-C-HRII-5-TEMPEL1-SURF-TEMP-MAPS-V1.0
Flight - Navigation Imaging
---------------------------
HRII raw cruise : DIF-CAL-HRIV-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.0
HRII raw encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
HRII reduced encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI raw cruise : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.1
MRI raw encounter : DIF-C-MRI-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1
MRI reduced encounter : DIF-C-MRI-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1
ITS raw cruise : DII-CAL-ITS-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.1
ITS raw encounter : DII-C-ITS-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1
ITS reduced encounter : DII-C-ITS-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview
=========================
The documentation in this data set was prepared, used, and internally
checked by the science, navigation, data center, and archive teams for
the Deep Impact project.
Review
======
Earlier, partial versions of this data set passed peer-reviews held
in November 2006. The final, full version of this data set was
reviewed in April 2007 and was accepted for the PDS archive pending
resolution of liens (that were completed in December 2007).
